section_id: ## 6. Fourth Derivative Chain Rule for Regularized Standard Deviation

hints.label: lem-reg-fourth-chain
hints.title: Chain Rule for $\sigma'_{\text{reg}}$
hints.content:
690: :label: lem-reg-fourth-chain
691: 
692: For $h(x) = \sigma'_{\text{reg}}(V(x))$ where $V(x) = \sigma^2_\rho[f_k, d, x]$, the fourth derivative is:
693: 
694: $$
695: \begin{align}
696: \nabla^4 h = \,&(\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(4)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 4} + 6 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(3)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 2} \otimes \nabla^2 V \\
697: &+ 3 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot (\nabla^2 V)^{\otimes 2} + 4 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot \nabla V \otimes \nabla^3 V \\
698: &+ (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(1)}(V) \cdot \nabla^4 V
699: \end{align}
700: 
701: $$
702: 
703: **Norm bound:**
704: 
705: $$
706: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{6 \cdot 3}{8\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{4}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
707: 
708: $$
709: 
710: Simplifying:
711: 
712: $$
713: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{9}{4\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{1}{\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
714:
hints.section: ## 6. Fourth Derivative Chain Rule for Regularized Standard Deviation
hints.raw_directive:
687: ## 6. Fourth Derivative Chain Rule for Regularized Standard Deviation
688: 
689: :::{prf:lemma} Chain Rule for $\sigma'_{\text{reg}}$
690: :label: lem-reg-fourth-chain
691: 
692: For $h(x) = \sigma'_{\text{reg}}(V(x))$ where $V(x) = \sigma^2_\rho[f_k, d, x]$, the fourth derivative is:
693: 
694: $$
695: \begin{align}
696: \nabla^4 h = \,&(\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(4)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 4} + 6 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(3)}(V) \cdot (\nabla V)^{\otimes 2} \otimes \nabla^2 V \\
697: &+ 3 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot (\nabla^2 V)^{\otimes 2} + 4 (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(2)}(V) \cdot \nabla V \otimes \nabla^3 V \\
698: &+ (\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(1)}(V) \cdot \nabla^4 V
699: \end{align}
700: 
701: $$
702: 
703: **Norm bound:**
704: 
705: $$
706: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{6 \cdot 3}{8\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{4}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
707: 
708: $$
709: 
710: Simplifying:
711: 
712: $$
713: \|\nabla^4 h\| \le \frac{15}{16\sigma'^7_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^4 + \frac{9}{4\sigma'^5_{\min}} \|\nabla V\|^2 \|\nabla^2 V\| + \frac{3}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla^2 V\|^2 + \frac{1}{\sigma'^3_{\min}} \|\nabla V\| \|\nabla^3 V\| + \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \|\nabla^4 V\|
714: 
715: $$

hints.label: proof-lem-reg-fourth-chain
hints.content:
720: :label: proof-lem-reg-fourth-chain
721: 
722: Apply the Faà di Bruno formula (Section 2.2) to the composition $h = \sigma'_{\text{reg}} \circ V$ with:
723: 
724: - $g = \sigma'_{\text{reg}}$, $f = V$
725: - $|g^{(1)}| \le L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} = 1/(2\sigma'_{\min})$
726: - $|g^{(2)}| \le L_{\sigma''_{\text{reg}}} = 1/(4\sigma'^3_{\min})$
727: - $|g^{(3)}| \le L_{\sigma'''_{\text{reg}}} = 3/(8\sigma'^5_{\min})$
728: - $|g^{(4)}| \le L_{(\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(4)}} = 15/(16\sigma'^7_{\min})$
hints.section: ## 6. Fourth Derivative Chain Rule for Regularized Standard Deviation
hints.raw_directive:
717: :::
718: 
719: :::{prf:proof}
720: :label: proof-lem-reg-fourth-chain
721: 
722: Apply the Faà di Bruno formula (Section 2.2) to the composition $h = \sigma'_{\text{reg}} \circ V$ with:
723: 
724: - $g = \sigma'_{\text{reg}}$, $f = V$
725: - $|g^{(1)}| \le L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} = 1/(2\sigma'_{\min})$
726: - $|g^{(2)}| \le L_{\sigma''_{\text{reg}}} = 1/(4\sigma'^3_{\min})$
727: - $|g^{(3)}| \le L_{\sigma'''_{\text{reg}}} = 3/(8\sigma'^5_{\min})$
728: - $|g^{(4)}| \le L_{(\sigma'_{\text{reg}})^{(4)}} = 15/(16\sigma'^7_{\min})$
729:
